entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
